description: Mentioned only in passing by Irwin, who says: �a most valuable and beautiful Echo Dulciana Mixture can sound much softer than an 8' Quintaton.� All we can assume is that it is some form of Mixture composed of Echo Dulciana ranks. Examples None known. Contributions welcome. Bibliography Irwin[1]: Mixture. FOOTER Original site compiled by Edward L. Stauff. For educational use only.
